data.title: KPMG Careers
data.text:
Raising the Bar in a High-Stakes Tax Landscape

KPMG’s Tax professionals work every step of the way in helping tax leaders constantly raise the bar in a high-stakes tax landscape. Our knowledge and experience rank us among the world’s top tax firms. But what really sets us apart is our passion, collaboration, and commitment to our client’s business success. Here, you’ll work with clients to learn all you can about their organization, understand their goals at the deepest level, and uncover unexpected opportunities.

The Future of Tax

When you join KPMG Tax, you will have access to leading tax technology, and more importantly, the educational tools to learn the technology. From formal trainings to on-the-job learning from your experienced team members, we engage our people by fostering a culture of ideation and collaboration while developing the tax professional of the future. Everyone has a voice when it comes to transforming tax.

KPMG innovates using technologies including intelligent automation, artificial intelligence, and blockchain while utilizing cloud platforms to help professionals focus on business and tax analysis to solve key issues. As technology transforms, “busy work” is reduced and our tax professionals can focus on what they do best – accounting, advising, problem-solving. Explore and learn about each of our service lines to see how you can create lasting change.

We are reimagining tax now and for the future.

Read More... Learn More icon / external revision

Tax Experienced Seasonal Opportunities

KPMG recognizes the demands of today’s workforce are often different from those of the past, which is why we continue to develop and offer new ways for our team to succeed. Our KPMG Seasonal Talent Team employees enjoy multiple benefits such as the advantages of working for a set period of time during the year, using leading technology, and receiving an attractive compensation package.

As a team member, you’ll be part of a high-performance culture where you will work with dynamic tax engagement teams and benefit from professional development opportunities. You’ll be given access to extensive training to sharpen your technical skills. In addition, you will have the opportunity to grow your professional network and make valuable connections.

Bring your talent and ability to the KPMG Seasonal Talent Team and let’s work together to build something bigger.

Read More... Explore Seasonal opportunities in Tax icon / external revision

Championing DEI

True success for any new hire requires the ability to thrive at our firm and in our culture. Our diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) initiatives seek to achieve that and continue to evolve. We strive to ensure all our people can bring their full, authentic selves to work each and every day.

Leading Through Listening

At KPMG, we believe some of our best ideas come from our professionals and the unique insights they have garnered throughout their careers. We empower our people to voice their professional opinions, provide their perspectives and speak up if they have valuable feedback that can better our practice and the work we do for our clients.

KPMG LLP offers a comprehensive compensation and benefits package. KPMG is an affirmative action-equal opportunity employer. KPMG complies with all applicable federal, state, and local laws regarding recruitment and hiring. All qualified applicants are considered for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other category protected by applicable federal, state, or local laws. The attached link contains further information regarding the firm's compliance with federal, state, and local recruitment and hiring laws. KPMG maintains a drug-free workplace.

Employment with KPMG is "At Will," which means that employment may be terminated with or without cause and with or without notice at any time at the discretion of either KPMG or the employee.
